About Me

A few things about myself.

BIO

Hello, my name is Sean Reed. I'm a Front-End Web Developer and Graphic Designer. I live in Atlanta,GA. I'm obsessed with Web Design, Art, and Music. I have over 15 years experince in the design field and I've been actively aquiring more skill and knowledge in the web development landscape. When I'm not designing, I love spending quality time with my family, polishing my music production skills or working out.
